thread.title: New York City Mayor Supports Supervised Drug-Use Facilities

author: Kate King
title: New York City Mayor Supports Supervised Drug-Use Facilities
text:
New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio is backing the use of facilities where users can inject drugs under medical supervision, saying they are necessary to prevent overdose deaths and encourage addiction treatment.
Overdose fatalities in New York City have more than doubled since 2000, with a record-high 1,441 people dying last year, according to a city report released Thursday. Proponents say safe-injection facilities will save lives and prevent the spread of disease, while critics say the sites would condone illegal activity...
